sentence: We had a deluxe one bedroom suite comprised of a living room with sleeping sofa a bedroom with a King size bed one bathroom and a kitchenette
Prepaid the room in full as to have free wi fi access during my stay
Room was very nice restaurant was very good and the location was close to everything we wanted to do
We found the beds to be extremely comfortable and the rooms spacious and well priced
Excellent views of Empire State Building
We had and excellent view of the Chrysler Building and the Empire State building
TV was nice with lots of channels
Hotel was fun but the staff was super helpful and booked us a room at a nearby hotel
Rooms were comfortable plenty of space for an NYC hotel and we enjoyed every minute there
Room was clean cozy and comfortable
Went with the kids and were in one room but pretty large
The rooms are evocative of the movie The Shinning except the terror induced is somehow achieved without Stephen King or Stanley Kubricks talents
Hotel staff did great job of getting us 3 rooms in row with 2 connecting through so we could still have gathering place
The suite was perfect for my needs but was disappointed in one thing the shower
After being convinced to by David she did so and he came up and opened my window
We returned to the hotel around 10 got our room keys and luggage immediately and went upstairs to our room
Lastly the view was actually nice from the lower floor with some greenery but the windows were pretty dirty so still not sure
The one bed room suite was clean large comfortable and well equipped but had a very small bath with no bathtub
Excellent service but rooms look a bit old fashioned and could be renovated

Perhaps some guests would like it to close down for a couple of weeks renovation prior to their two night stayThe rooms are pretty big for Manhattan and the location is great close to everything but tucked away in Murray Hill
The thermostat was broken the temperature did not rise in the room I resided in
Bedroom tv in suite did not work lamps did not work Bar seemed to be out of many items and not well stocked
It would be nice to have a pen and laundry bag in the room
No view from our room in 1403 just the courtyard but that ’s fine
We have purchased two rooms and and they are both at 80 degrees and will no let us use our air conditioning
The room was available when I arrived at the hotel at 2PM
The rooftop bar is seasonal but the roof was still accessible to see great views of the surrounding buildings
they could n’t seem to grasp what herbal tea was and there was an old menu in the room so they charged us more than we thought but rectified it on checkout
Things I found to be unsatisfactory were there were no wash cloths in our bathroom
we really were only in the room to sleep or a short rest before heading out for the evening
